message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,000. It's a great deal, and I'm sure you'll find it very valuable. Let me know your thoughts.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I believe I can only afford to pay up to $10,000 for it. Would you consider reducing the price?

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, and I appreciate your interest. I'm willing to come down to $10,500, but I can't go any lower than that.  Let me know if you're interested in this price.
